title: WTB:  1909 Obak Speas (Last Card Needed to Finish the Set!)
author: Anthony S.

posts.post_title: WTB:  1909 Obak Speas (Last Card Needed to Finish the Set!)
posts.post_content:
I'd like to buy a 1909 Obak Speas.  Last card I need to finish the 1909 Obak set.   My email is:   [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]

Should you sell me one you would experience the unbridled joy that accompanies the knowledge that you, and you alone, were the deciding factor in another collector accomplishing his dream.  To better elucidate the profound emotions of the moment I have attached an apt video.

[url]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r5KeGccP9Jk[/url]


I should note that I'm not looking for a high grade (ie expensive) example.  January brought a few unforeseen expenses.
